amendment.description: An amendment comprised of the following amendments printed in House Report 117-75 as en bloc No. 2: Nos. 5, 9, 15, 31, 34, 43, 52, 61, 62, 63, 65, 74, 76, 86, 94, 100, 112, 114, 119, 121, and 143.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lamb amendments (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A003) pursuant to the rule.
Amendments en bloc (A003) offered by Mr. Lamb.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendments en bloc (A003) offered by Mr. Lamb.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Lamb amendments (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Lamb amendments (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
